titleStmt.title: A touch-stone for a Christian Wherein is shewed, how a man may know, whether he be the Temple of the Holy Ghost, hath a sauing faith, be the childe of God, hath truly repented, and (in one word) be a Christian in deed, or in name onely. By Thomas Broade.
titleStmt.author: Broad, Thomas, 1577 or 8-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood for Thomas Hauiland, and are to be sold at his shop in Gilt-spurre street without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; the second part, "A Christians vvarre", has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
Part 2 is identified as STC 3805 on UMI microfilm, reel 1299.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1228 (part 1 only) and at reel 1299 (part 2 only).
